Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory54.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStorySnowNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'Rosetta takes the CUB to the snowy forest nearby. Like most machines Rosetta is familiar with, CUBs will silently carry out the previous command unless given a new command.'}
{3: '—Just like how this CUB has been silently following Rosetta, unresponsive to other external interferences.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'One more parameter to test. Time to collect data on its maximum speed.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "Here is the route. I'll observe it from here.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'After setting the route, Rosetta stands on a snow-covered bluff.'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Begin!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Receiving the command, the CUB stirs its front hooves, kicking up the snow, then quickly gallops along the planned route.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory105.png'}
{3: 'Rosetta connects with the CUB to monitor the data and establishes a visual link with its visual module.'}
{3: 'Through the connection, Rosetta watches the snow fly by at blistering speed.'}
{3: 'As the CUB charges through the bush, snow falling from the trees is quickly swept off the frame without any chance to accumulate.'}
{3: '—Just like how she ran in the past.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'As the CUB advances along the route, a white figure suddenly dashes by a low-lying patch of bushes off to the side.'}
{3: "Following it's alert protocol, the CUB slowly approaches the bushes."}
{3: 'Rosetta is unable to discern anything from the various tracks found in the area. As the CUB gets closer, Rosetta subconsciously holds her breath.'}
{3: 'Right as the CUB cautiously checks the bushes, she sees a snow squirrel.'}
{3: 'The snow squirrel dashes in front of the CUB and climbs to the top of a tree carrying some kind of nut.'}
{3: 'Rosetta exhales quietly after confirming that everything is alright.'}
{3: 'The CUB watches the squirrel disappear into the treetops, then raises its legs as if to jump.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineSpreadNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'After jumping once, then twice, the CUB continues galloping onward.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'However, it no longer charges relentlessly through the branches and snow. Instead, it begins to prance briskly.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The visual module quickly shifts up and down as it jumps and lands.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'As its speed begins to increase, the inertia extends its duration in the air with each jump.'}
{3: 'Gallop... Jump... Land... Gallop... Jump... Land...'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineSpreadNew.prefab'}
{3: 'The CUB seems to be deliberately jumping as it makes its way forward.'}
{3: "A thought long buried in Rosetta's M.I.N.D. quickly resurfaces."}
{3: '—The meaning behind jumping.'}
{3: 'It is the momentary thrill of breaking free from the surface—the thrill of freedom.'}
{3: "Breaking free... Breaking free... Continuously breaking free from the surface's hold."}
{3: 'A tall snow slope appears around the bend. Rather than stopping, the CUB increases speed.', 4: '1'}
{3: "It quickly ascends the snow slope and leaps high into the sky from its summit. The frame's exterior reflects a striking display of sunlight.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Landing on the other side of the snow slope, the CUB sees a group of snow-white figures.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Creatures that share a resemblance to the CUB's equine form."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: "Hmm... Looks like we've accidentally stumbled into their neck of the woods.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'A herd of horses is a rare sight to behold in the wilderness.'}
{3: 'They gather together and look at the CUB.'}
{3: 'After a few circles around the CUB, the horses slowly leave. But before they do, they turn to look back at it.'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Is that... an invitation?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Right as Rosetta ponders their behavior, the CUB takes a step forward.'}
{3: 'The system issues a warning to indicate a deviation from the planned route, but the CUB continues to follow the horses.'}
{3: 'What starts off as a slow trot turns into an all-out gallop with the herd.'}
{3: 'It runs with the horses.'}
{3: "The crisp sound of the horses' hooves crushing branches and the rushing wind through the snowy forest drowns out the CUB's warning system."}
{3: 'Delicate snowflakes flutter in the dazzling sunlight.'}
{3: 'The CUB gallops with reckless abandon. Some kind of signal seems to be sprouting within it.'}
{3: 'Phweeee—'}
{3: 'After a long whistle, the horses surrounding the CUB gradually disappear.'}
{3: 'Rosetta uses her familiarity with the surrounding environment to rush toward the CUB.'}
{3: "Her figure appears in the CUB's field of vision—the first person it saw after waking up from within the dark confines of the airdrop."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: "I'm done with the preparations. How's your progress?", 4: '2'}
{3: "Asimov's transmission cuts her off mid-sentence. She remains quiet for a moment before slowly opening her mouth."}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "...There were some deviations with the preset configurations, but I've collected all of the data.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "I'll look into the deviations later. Right now, let's finish calibrating your frame.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Asimov promptly terminates the comms. The CUB stands there quietly facing Rosetta across the dense flurry of snowflakes.'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "Let's get back.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Receiving the order, the CUB slowly walks up to Rosetta's side and continues back to the familiar darkness of the airdrop."}
